detail_desc: Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit bamboo blend with wide elastication at the tops.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit bamboo blend with wide elastication at the tops.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Printed set with a top and pair of joggers. Top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend in a casual style and relaxed fit with a easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The joggers are made partly from recycled polyester.

Printed set with a top and pair of joggers. Top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend in a casual style and relaxed fit with a easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The joggers are made partly from recycled polyester.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in crisp cotton poplin with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in crisp cotton poplin with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with a sweetheart neckline, elastic shoulder straps and pearly buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, a smocked seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer at the hem. Lined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in cotton poplin with a frill-trimmed square neckline front and back and smocked bodice. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and straight, wide legs with pockets in the side seams.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication, fake back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Tunic in crinkled satin with a round neckline and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Seam with narrow ties under the bust.
Short dungaree dress in washed, stretch denim with adjustable shoulder straps, a chest pocket, and buttons at the sides. Unlined.

Short, one-shoulder dress in a patterned viscose weave with a short, flounced sleeve, frill-trimmed, covered elastication at the top and smocking at the waist. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short, flared dress in an airy, textured cotton weave. Elasticated, square neckline, gathered tiers and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, flared dress in an airy, textured cotton weave. Elasticated, square neckline, gathered tiers and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Dungarees in soft, stretch denim. Relaxed fit with adjustable straps, a heart-shaped chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.

Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with jersey-lined legs. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a frill trim down the sides of the bib, and a fake fly. Press-studs at the sides, and front and back pockets. Lined in patterned cotton jersey.
Skirt in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, front pockets and buttons on the front. The bottom buttons are purely decorative.

Warm-lined jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, fake flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Soft faux shearling lining.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend. The cotton content of the socks is organic. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend. The cotton content of the socks is organic. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and long sleeves with frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and long sleeves with frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and long sleeves with frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with soft elastication at the waist.
Loafers in imitation leather with block heels, a decorative tab and seam at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Linings and insoles in imitation leather and chunky soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Pointed court shoes in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Covered block heels, linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

A-line dress in a cotton weave with straps that cross at the back and can be adjusted with concealed buttons at the back. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and gathered tiers on the skirt. Unlined.

Jeans in stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with covered elastication at the waist and a small frill trim at the top. Fake fly, side and back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted soles.
Knee-length dress in soft modal and cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a drawstring at the waist.
Knee-length dress in soft modal and cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a drawstring at the waist.
Sleeveless nursing top in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a double layer at the top and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, narrow frill trim around the elbows and covered elastication at the cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, narrow frill trim around the elbows and covered elastication at the cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, narrow frill trim around the elbows and covered elastication at the cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

Dress in a cotton and viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed, V-shaped seam at the top, and long balloon sleeves with a flounce around the shoulder seams and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gently gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous sleeves finishing with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous sleeves finishing with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous sleeves finishing with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a frill-trimmed, rounded collar in a cotton weave and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a flared, tiered skirt.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a frill-trimmed, rounded collar in a cotton weave and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a flared, tiered skirt.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and large, pointed lace collar. Opening with a concealed zip at the back and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and large, pointed lace collar. Opening with a concealed zip at the back and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.

Short dress in cotton poplin with a V-neck, buttons down the front, gathered shoulder seams and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist, a fabric belt with a covered buckle, discreet pockets in the side seams and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Two-strand metal chain necklace. One chain has letter pendants and one has a pendant in the shape of an angel. Adjustable length. Trigger clasp.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and narrow ties at the neckline. Covered buttons and flounces at the top, flounced trims at the shoulders, long sleeves and frill trims at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a seam at the hem. Lined skirt.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and narrow ties at the neckline. Covered buttons and flounces at the top, flounced trims at the shoulders, long sleeves and frill trims at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a seam at the hem. Lined skirt.
Short dress in denim with a lace-trimmed collar. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tapered waist. Unlined.

Tunic in an organic cotton weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathers on the shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Tunic in an organic cotton weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathers on the shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Glasses chain in chunky, textured metal chain with plastic loop fasteners. Can also be worn as a necklace. Length 80 cm.

Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim. Round, gathered neckline with an opening and narrow ties at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft textured knit with a V-neck, loop fasteners with pearly plastic beads down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft textured knit with a V-neck, loop fasteners with pearly plastic beads down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a frill-trimmed, rounded collar in a cotton weave, dropped shoulder seams and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a lightweight, patterned viscose twill with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish. V-neck with an asymmetric edge, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Mules with a high platform and two foot straps in scuba fabric, one with concealed elastication into the soles. Jersey linings and fluted soles. Height of soles 7.5 cm.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Grandad collar, buttons down the front and a lace-trimmed yoke front and back. Long, wide sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs.

Blouse in airy, patterned crêpe with a small, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim. Unlined.

Blouse in airy, patterned crêpe with a small, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim. Unlined.

Blouse in airy, patterned crêpe with a small, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in washed cotton denim with frills. Frill-trimmed collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in an airy weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.
Knee-length coat in a wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal welt front pockets and a high-cut back vent. Lined.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets, a zip at the cuffs and a tab and decorative press-stud at the sides. Recycled polyester lining.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets, a zip at the cuffs and a tab and decorative press-stud at the sides. Recycled polyester lining.

Short dress in lace made from a cotton blend with a deep V-neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication around the shoulders and concealed elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim, and a flared skirt with a wide, scallop-edged flounce at the hem. Lined.
